name: Slider-Man Demo
description: From the guts of Arctic Flow, Slider-Man is a fast paced arcade sliding game. Earn points and time by performing tricks and landing combos. Jump and flip from ramp to ramp while sliding with style and try to get the high score! Both this demo version and the full Slider-Man will be updated with bug fixes and other improvements, and even more levels and multiplayer modes depending on interest. Head to patreon.com/jasonjumps for more info on development.
